title: ngVikings 2020 - The legendary Angular conference in the Nordics. May 25-26th, Oslo, Norway
description: Having Angular team members, Google Developer Experts and legendary international speakers onboard, ngVikings Conference guarantees an excellent program: fresh, technically deep and 100% useful.
keywords: event, angular, gde, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud
dates: May 25: Framework Day, May 26: Frontend Day

team.description:
ngVikings is a 100% community-driven event comprised of many Nordic Angular groups with more than 3500 active members in total:
  • AngularJS Copenhagen
  • GDG Copenhagen
  • AngularJS Oslo
  • AngularJS Gothenburg
  • ngAarhus
  • ngStockholm
  • Angular Finland

blocks.title: What is ngVikings?
blocks.description: ngVikings is a community-driven Angular conference travelling across the Nordic countries. The 4th ngVikings event is scheduled for the 25th & 26th of May in Oslo, Norway. This event will gather 400+ front-end developers from different countries together. It's the largest Angular conference hosted in the Nordic countries. The talks and workshops will be mostly about Angular and other technologies related to the Angular framework. ngVikings operates as a non-profit organization.
